CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 PSCs based on bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) architecture are of particular interests since high performance devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) exceed 8% can be achieved.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 1-3 PSCs |
| bulk - heterojunction (BHJ) |

Explanation:

1. 1-3 PSCs: This is a material name as it refers to a specific type of perovskite solar cells (PSCs) with a certain range of crystal sizes.
2. bulk - heterojunction (BHJ): This is another material name as it refers to a specific type of heterojunction used in solar cells, which is made up of a bulk material and a heterojunction material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bulk - heterojunction (BHJ) |

Explanation:

1. bulk - heterojunction (BHJ): This is the only valid material name in the paragraph as it refers to a specific type of heterojunction used in solar cells, which is made up of a bulk material and a heterojunction material.
2. 1-3 PSCs: This is not a clear material name as it refers to a range of crystal sizes for perovskite solar cells (PSCs) and not a specific material.

1. 1-3 PSCs: This refers to "1-3 Photovoltaic Solar Cells" which is a property name in the context of the paragraph.
2. bulk - heterojunction (BHJ): This refers to a specific type of architecture used in photovoltaic solar cells, which is a property name in the context of the paragraph.
3. power conversion efficiencies (PCE): This refers to the efficiency of converting solar power into electrical power, which is a property name in the context of the paragraph.

1. bulk - heterojunction (BHJ): This refers to a specific type of architecture used in photovoltaic solar cells, which is a material property name in the context of the paragraph.

The other entities, "1-3 PSCs" and "power conversion efficiencies (PCE)", do not refer to material properties. "1-3 PSCs" refers to a type of photovoltaic solar cells, but it is not a material property. "Power conversion efficiencies (PCE)" refers to the efficiency of converting solar power into electrical power, which is not a material property.
